text:
What's new is the fact they're making so many spin-offs.

author: ShakinJamacian

author: Sephiko

text:
Order of Ecclesia.

Portrait of Ruin is a rushed games with bugs, and a clear lack of polish. It runs with so many ideas...and does none of them well.

The rehashed paintings, lame co-operative elements, the pointless subweapon grinding, it all adds up to a package that tries to be a jack of all trades, but masters none.

At best, look at PoR as an anniversary game, with references to older games. Looking at it as a fresh, unique game will probably lead to direct disappointment and fury.
author: ShakinJamacian

text: Which is better. Portrait of Ruin or Order of Ecclesia?
